issue.title: [Rust] use bit-packing for boolean vectors
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2483](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2483). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Boolean vectors now use 1 byte for each value, which seems wasteful. We could use bit-packing to store the values, similar to the CPP implementation.
